item.title: 搭建gollum
item.description: 忽略 使用docker部署gollum, dockerFile 1FROM ruby:2.4.1-alpine 2MAINTAINER ilanni <ilanni@ilanni.com> 3RUN set -xe \ 4&& echo "https://mirrors.aliyun.com/alpine/v3.4/main" > /etc/apk/repositories \ 5&& echo "https://mirrors.aliyun.com/alpine/v3.4/community" >> /etc/apk/repositories \ 6&& apk --update add alpine-sdk icu-dev git rsync openssh \ 7&& gem install gollum github-markdown \ 8&& rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* \ 9&& mkdir -p /gollum/ \ 10&& git init
